title: Sing, yo! (This is probably a stumper)
content:
Chello ladies and gents!

I have been looking for a substantial amount of time now and cannot find what this font is. Frustrated, sure. Hopeless, you bet. Anybody?

Gracias

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022749im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/unknownfont_5165.jpg)

 [‹ Handwriting font in former issues of POPmagazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022749/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49845 "Go to previous forum topic") [cooper-ish font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022749/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49886 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Dubtron9000

comments.content: Wouohoooww, well, lot of wasted pixels. Not much to recognize. But »Sing« could be [Binner Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022749/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/binner-poster/).
